Name: Ancient Archives 2
Description: Gain 2 Tome of Traits.

Name: Band Of Thieves 2
Description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

Name: Battlemage 3
Description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

Name: Binary Airdrop
Description: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

Name: Birthday Present
Description: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

Name: Built Different 3
Description: Your units with no Traits active gain 500 Health and 80% Attack Speed.

Name: Celestial Blessing 3
Description: Your units heal for 20% of the damage dealt by attacks and abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 600 Health.

Name: Cruel Pact
Description: Buying XP costs 3 Health instead of gold.

Name: Cursed Crown
Description: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

Name: Cybernetic Implants 3
Description: Your units equipped with an item gain 400 Health and 25 Attack Damage

Name: Cybernetic Shell 3
Description: Your units holding an item gain 350 Health and 60 Armor.

Name: Cybernetic Uplink 3
Description: Your units holding an item gain 350 Health and restore 4 Mana per second.

Name: Disintegrator 3
Description: Your unit's attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3.5% of the target's maximum Health.

Name: Double Trouble 3
Description: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 44 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you upgrade to 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

Name: Electrocharge 3
Description: Whenever your units receive a critical strike, they deal 200 magic damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Exiles 3
Description: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 50% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

Name: Featherweights 3
Description: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 90% movement and Attack Speed.

Name: Future Sight 2
Description: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

Name: Golden Ticket
Description: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

Name: High End Shopping
Description: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

Name: High Roller
Description: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 8 gold.

Name: Item Grab Bag 2
Description: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

Name: Knife's Edge 3
Description: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 40 Attack Damage.

Name: Level Up!
Description: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 4 experience points. You can now reach level 10.

Name: Living Forge
Description: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

Name: Lucky Gloves
Description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions items that they can use well. Gain a Thief's Gloves.

Name: Luden's Echo 3
Description: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 300 bonus magic damage.

Name: Makeshift Armor 3
Description: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

Name: March Of Progress
Description: Gain 5 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

Name: New Recruit
Description: Gain +1 team size.

Name: Preparation 3
Description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 12 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 48.

Name: Radiant Relics
Description: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Radiant items.

Name: Scoped Weapons 2
Description: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

Name: Stand United 3
Description: Your units gain 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

Name: The Golden Egg
Description: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 10 turns.

Name: Think Fast
Description: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 8 gold.

Name: Threat Level: Maximum
Description: TBD

Name: Tri Force 3
Description: Your 3-cost champions gain 433 Health, 33 Mana, and 43% Attack Speed.

Name: Urf's Grab Bag 2
Description: Gain 1 Spatula and 2 random item components.

Name: Verdant Veil
Description: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Name: Windfall
Description: Gain 20 gold.

Name: Windfall Plus
Description: Gain 30 gold.

Name: Windfall Plus Plus
Description: Gain 40 gold.

Name: Wise Spending
Description: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

Name: Woodland Charm
Description: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

Name: Ace Crown
Description: Gain an Ace Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and 2 gold.

Name: A.D.M.I.N Crown
Description: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.

Name: Aegis Crown
Description: Gain an Aegis Emblem, a Redemption, and an Alistar.

Name: Anima Squad Crown
Description: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Riven.

Name: Brawler Crown
Description: Gain a Brawler Emblem, a Redemption, and a Riven.

Name: Spellslinger Crown
Description: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem, a Jewled Gauntlet, and a Sona.

Name: Civilian Crown
Description: Gain a Civilian Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Sivir.

Name: Sureshot Crown
Description: Gain a Sureshot Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Senna.

Name: Defender Crown
Description: Gain a Defender Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Riven.

Name: Duelist Crown
Description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, an Edge of Night, and a Nilah.

Name: Mecha: PRIME Crown
Description: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem, a Titan's Resolve , and a Jax.

Name: Hacker Crown
Description: Gain a Hacker Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Leblanc.

Name: Heart Crown
Description: Gain a Heart Emblem, a ZZ'rot Portal, and a Sona.

Name: LaserCorps Crown
Description: Gain a LaserCorps Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Senna.

Name: Mascot Crown
Description: Gain a Mascot Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and an Malphite.

Name: Ox Force Crown
Description: Gain an Ox Force Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Alistar.

Name: Prankster Crown
Description: Gain a Prankster Emblem, an Edge of Night, and a Zoe.

Name: Recon Crown
Description: Gain a Recon Emblem, a Zeke's Herald, and a Ezreal.

Name: Renegade Crown
Description: Gain a Renegade Crown, a Bloodthirster, and a Camille.

Name: Star Guardian Crown
Description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Chalice of Power and a Nilah.

Name: Underground Crown
Description: Gain an Underground Emblem, a Hextech Gunblade, and a Sona.

Name: Gadgeteen Soul
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain an Ionic Spark and an Annie.

Name: Supers Soul
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Lee Sin.

Name: Underground Soul
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Hextech Gunblade and an Ezreal.
